info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 5 at 2:51PM PDT until September 5 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Las Vegas NV
info.description:
FFWVEF
The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Nye County in south central Nevada...
* Until 600 PM PDT.
* At 251 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly along Extraterrestrial Highway, also known as State Route 375.
HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Nye County along State Route 375.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 6:00 PM PDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 6:00 PM PDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 6:00 PM PDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 6:00 PM PDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
